document.full_text: a federal board will soon propose that u.s. states disclose more about their pension funding as worries grow whether states and municipalities can pay for their employees' pensions.
document.title: u.s. wants states to reveal more about pension funding
lines_and_colors: a federal board will soon propose that u.s. states disclose more about their pension funding as worries grow whether states and municipalities can pay for their employees' pensions.
